Algorithms

Class ShortestPathAlgo

  • java.lang.Object
    • Algorithms.ShortestPathAlgo

  • public class ShortestPathAlgo
extends java.lang.Object
    Description: the class calculates the best route for each packman to eat, considering the number of fruits in a game. the class has only one field which is an arraylist of paths, that updates as the algorithm is built. the class consider the number of fruits when creating the paths, for a game with less than 21 fruits the algorithm uses a more accurate method, but for a large number of fruits it switches to a simpler method, otherwise the program is overwhelmed.
    Author:
    Yarden and Caroline

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ShortestPathAlgo(Game g)
      Description: the constuctor builds itself from a game object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<Packman> getPackmanPaths() 
      void setPackmanPaths(java.util.ArrayList<Packman> packmanPaths) 
      void SimplePathCalculator(java.util.ArrayList<Fruit> FruitSet)
      Description: the method goes over all the packman objects, look for the closest fruit to them and assign in to their path, and then deletes it from the main fruit list.
      void SmartPathCalculator(java.util.ArrayList<Fruit> FruitSet)
      Description: the method runs over all the packman objects in the game and assign to them the closest fruit in the game, then it searches for the packman closest to its fruit and adds it to it's path, deletes the fruit from the main fruits list clears everything and starts from the top.
      java.lang.String toString()

    • Method Detail

      • SmartPathCalculator

        public void SmartPathCalculator(java.util.ArrayList<Fruit> FruitSet)
        Description: the method runs over all the packman objects in the game and assign to them the closest fruit in the game, then it searches for the packman closest to its fruit and adds it to it's path, deletes the fruit from the main fruits list clears everything and starts from the top. the method stops when the main fruit list is finally empty.
        Parameters:
        FruitSet -
